Platforms.notes:
This platform allows your previously added homekit accessories to now work with Alexa

To get started, please create an account here:  https://www.homebridge.ca/newuser

 Next add the "homebridge" skill to your amazon alexa and sign in using the same credentials: https://www.amazon.com/Northern-Man-54-Homebridge/dp/B07B9QMTFQ

Finally enter those same credentials below and add the accesssory. Once complete ask Alexa to "Find Devices" 

Note: Alexa does not handle multiple homes. So if you plan on setting up an Alexa in multiple homes, please ensure that your Alexas are registered under different accounts and you sign up with an alternate email
Platforms.credits: This add on was created by NorthernMan54, more info can be found on their github: https://github.com/NorthernMan54/homebridge-alexa

Platforms.notes:
This platform allows you to control your Vantage Infusion loads, thermostats, and blinds through Siri or Alexa

Optional:
If you wish to add loads within a range of VIDs, please enter the range below as "startVID,endVID" eg: 1,1000
If you want to omit certain loads, enter the load VIDs seperated by a comma eg: 15,23,155

Note:
Newer versions of Design Center require a username and password. If you have not set that up, you can leave these fields blank
